item.title: R Art - Varsarely
item.description: Varsarely The first canvas card! It was fun experimenting with different ways of using ggplot to present a grid of squares. I settled on creating collections of points and using geom_polygon() to render them. This allows the use of standard tidyverse data operations when preparing the data, and should be a fairly powerful paradigm to work with going forward. Definitely took a few attempts to correctly set up the matrix multiplication for the rotation transformations, but was a lot of fun seeing the visible impacts of my screw ups.
